body_html:
Code is here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/5a5a25ea3ebef623e07fb9a46419a9df377a37a5/tensorflow/examples/skflow/multiple_gpu.py

But I think problem is coming from:

with tf.device('/gpu:2'):
   ... some gpu computation ...
   tf.histogram(..)
   ... some more gpu computation ...

Either way, for this case we should just convert the test to the new Estimator that doesn't add automatic histograms.

body:
Code is here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/5a5a25ea3ebef623e07fb9a46419a9df377a37a5/tensorflow/examples/skflow/multiple_gpu.py

But I think problem is coming from:

```
with tf.device('/gpu:2'):
   ... some gpu computation ...
   tf.histogram(..)
   ... some more gpu computation ...
```

Either way, for this case we should just convert the test to the new `Estimator` that doesn't add automatic histograms.
